name: Arbisphere Launchpad
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
The first product that we will release is Arbisphere's Launchpad, the sale of our token $ARSH will be hosted in our own native platform, marking the beginning of our ecosystem and the start of a new era of sustainable protocols and platforms launches.

Shortly after the sale of our Launchpad and Governance token $ARSH, our Launchpad will host its first-ever launch, launching $SPHERE, the native token of Arbisphere's DEX.

Our DEX will open its doors to all Arbitrum users, offering high but sustainable yields thanks to our tokenomics strategies starting on our ecosystem tokens $SPHERE-USDC, $SPHERE-ETH, $ARSH-ETH, $ARSH-USDC, the most traded pairs such as $ETH-USDC, $WBTC-USDC and on 3Pool $USDC-$USDT-$DAI in our Stable-Swap AMM.
